ranking.name: Midjourney v6.1
ranking.description: Perfect balance of artistry and realism. Industry-leading prompt understanding and detail expression
ranking.description_ja: 芸術性とリアリズムのバランスが最高峰。プロンプト理解力とディテール表現で業界最高水準

ranking.name: DALL-E 3
ranking.description: Outstanding natural language prompt understanding. ChatGPT integration enables accurate visualization of complex instructions
ranking.description_ja: 自然言語プロンプトの理解力が圧倒的。ChatGPT統合で複雑な指示も正確に画像化

ranking.name: Stable Diffusion XL
ranking.description: Open-source and completely free. Excellent customizability with local execution support. Free for commercial use
ranking.description_ja: オープンソースで完全無料。ローカル実行可能でカスタマイズ性が最高。商用利用も自由

ranking.name: Adobe Firefly
ranking.description: Copyright-clear training data specialized for commercial use. Photoshop integration for professionals
ranking.description_ja: 商用利用に特化した著作権クリアな学習データ。Photoshop統合でプロフェッショナル向け

ranking.name: Leonardo AI
ranking.description: Specialized in game asset generation. Ideal for 3D and game development with consistent character and background generation
ranking.description_ja: ゲームアセット生成に特化。一貫性のあるキャラクター・背景生成で3D・ゲーム開発に最適

ranking.name: Imagen 3
ranking.description: Exceptional text rendering and light expression. Strong for enterprise use with Vertex AI integration
ranking.description_ja: テキストレンダリングと光の表現が卓越。Vertex AI統合でエンタープライズ利用に強み

ranking.name: Ideogram 2.0
ranking.description: Industry-leading text generation accuracy. Ideal for text-embedded images in logo, poster, and ad design
ranking.description_ja: テキスト生成精度が業界トップ。ロゴ・ポスター・広告デザインでの文字入れ画像に最適

ranking.name: Flux.1
ranking.description: Developed by former Stability AI developers. Combines prompt adherence with fast generation. Commercial plans available
ranking.description_ja: 元Stability AI開発者が開発。プロンプト追従性と高速生成を両立。商用プランあり

ranking.name: Microsoft Designer
ranking.description: Strong Office integration with DALL-E 3. Intuitive image insertion for business documents and presentations
ranking.description_ja: DALL-E 3統合でOffice連携が強力。ビジネス文書・プレゼン資料への画像挿入が直感的

ranking.name: Canva AI
ranking.description: Integration with 100,000 design templates. Professional-grade image generation even for non-designers
ranking.description_ja: デザインテンプレート10万種類と統合。非デザイナーでもプロ級の画像生成が可能
